ENTRY.refkeywords: list lists show get data dataset datasets ID IDS IDs id ids
ENTRY.SYNOPSIS: List all data set IDs in a Sherpa session.

DESC.PARA: Sherpa can contain, and perform fits to, several different data sets in a single Sherpa session. This function lists all data sets in a Sherpa session, by their IDs; it accepts no arguments. The Sherpa data ID allows the user to easily reference data, model, fit, and plotting information about a data set. The ID can be a user defined string or integer.
This function returns a list of all data sets which have been loaded into a Sherpa session, by their IDs.

BUGS.PARA: See the bugs pages on the Sherpa website for an up-to-date listing of known bugs.
